title: Win holidays to Dubai worth £12,000
text:
Win holidays to Dubai worth £12,000 20 August 2015 Save 
Gold Medal has instant rewards and 10 ‘Golden Bucket List’ Atlantis The Palm, Dubai holidays up for grabs 
In Gold Medal’s brand new ‘golden’ incentive, simply book an Atlantis The Palm, Dubai holiday with Emirates and you’ll instantly win golden rewards, plus be in with a chance to win one of 10 ‘Golden Bucket List’ Atlantis The Palm, Dubai holidays! 
For every booking receive £10 Farebank Rewards! Upgrade bonus: Include an Atlantis, The Palm suite or premium Emirates flights and your reward instantly doubles to £20! 
The Golden Bucket List holidays Gold Medal is giving away 10 incredible holidays to Atlantis, The Palm, which tick oﬀ everything on a ‘Golden Bucket List’ to Dubai! The 10 agents who have booked the most room nights will win one of these incredible holidays, each including: Two return economy class Emirates flights from their local airport with lounge access Meet & greet at Dubai airport with limousine transfers Three nights half board at Atlantis The Palm staying in a suite with butler service VIP private check-in Dining in a Michelin-starred restaurant Dolphin and sea lion encounters Snorkelling in Ambassador Lagoon (or dive if PADI certified) Helicopter ride and desert safari One spa treatment at Shuiqi Spa £250 resort credit A private cabana each day at Nasimi Beach Atlantis, The Palm goodie bag and luxury gift 
Helping you sell – decorate your store to win £350! When you make your first booking to Atlantis The Palm during the Gold Medal Golden Bucket List incentive, you’ll receive a pack of Atlantis The Palm and Gold Medal goodies for your store! Use your pack of goodies (and your imagination) to decorate your windows, doors and floors, and the best dressed store in each region at the end of the incentive will win £350! Keep your Gold Medal sales development manager – Leigh, Mark, Claire or Louisa – updated for your chance to win! 
To claim your prizes, send your booking references to GoldenBucketList@goldmedal.co.uk 
Valid on new bookings made between August 14 – September 27 2015. 
For more information call: 0800 014 7777 or visit: goldmedal.co.uk
